text: The Violent Sleep of Reason is the eighth studio album by Meshuggah. Meshuggah is a Swedish experimental metal band. The album was released on October 7, 2016. It had one single, "Born In Dissonance". Another song from the album was nominated for a Grammy Award. This song is named "Clockworks". Loudwire and Rolling Stone said it was one of the best heavy metal albums made in 2016. It is one of their highest charting albums.Peak chart positions in the United States: * * * == Track listing == All lyrics by Tomas Haake except "Ivory Tower" by Mårten Hagström. == References == Category:2016 albums Category:Meshuggah albums Category:Nuclear Blast albums
title: The Violent Sleep of Reason
